remarks: Morphisms between two terminal objects are inverses.  (Contributed by AV, 18-Apr-2020.)
statement:
termoeu1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
termoeu1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( TermO ` C ) ) $.
termoeu1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( TermO ` C ) ) $.
2termoinv $p |- ( ( ph /\ G e. ( B ( Hom ` C ) A ) /\ F e. ( A ( Hom ` C ) B ) ) -> F ( A ( Inv ` C ) B ) G ) $.
